short_summary: High Speed Remote Controlled Boats for ADCP deployments
description: Canada has a requirement to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply and delivery of Battery Operated Remote Controlled (RC) Boats, to Authorized Users on an as and when required basis. RC Boats may be delivered to various locations across Canada, including areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs). Offeror must submit firm prices that will apply for the entire period of the Standing Offer including any option periods. All prices must be in Canadian dollars, customs duties and excise taxes included, applicable taxes and delivery included. Due to the impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic, applicants must submit offers electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application. This service allows suppliers to submit bids, offers and arrangements electronically to PWGSC Bid Receiving Units. Offers will not be accepted if emailed directly to this email address; faxed or hard copy (submitted in person or via mail/courier) Offers will not be accepted for the subject bid solicitation. Optionally, candidates can also register to receive bid opportunity notifications via email through the Canada Post epost Connect application. The criterion for selection is based on the lowest price, the offer having no security requirements. The tool key is worked out to give the subscriber greater flexibility in the purchase of the service. Variations as set out in the participating programs as follows: No CITES regulation protection and clearing arrangements.
